answers.answer: I just found out myself and I totally flip out. I'm a nurse and I would never thought this can happen to me. However you need to change your eating habits and take your blood sugar one hour after meals and try to exercise. This is going to be a hard tasks for us but we can do it !!

:( I'm sorry. I found out I had it a week ago and had to go to a diabetes counselor and now I have to check my blood sugar 4 times a day. Just be careful on what you eat stay away from fruit juices and soda and watch your carb intake. Like pastas, bread and potatoes and try to exercise (walk for 30 min 3 times a week) hope this helps:)
Thank yall!! Where do i get the thing to check my blood sugar with?
I have GD too. Im still adjusting to the restrictions as well. Did the Dr. Tell you what your results were?
No he didnt. I will ask at my appointment monday & put it on here. Do you know what yours was.

question: I found out a few days ago i have GD and would really like some advice from someone who has/had it. My doctors nurse talked to me about it but im just still a little clueless. I have eatin whatever my whole life & never read the back of food before eating it lol. This is just so scarey and new for me. Thank you for any advice ladys.
title: Anyone else have gestational diabetes??
